title: Sarnıç Ne Duydu?
description:
Prepared for Ali Emre's "SARNIÇ" exhibition, "What Did Cistern Hear?" is an auditory projection that contains the layers of space and time.

Gülhane Cistern, where the exhibition was held, is a historical water tank, built in the 2nd century, witnessed the people of four different periods throughout its existence. The installation transforms the tones of each instrument representing these four different periods witnessed by the cistern into an algorithmic music.

“The sound installation accompanying the exhibition reminds me of a flow that spread over time with the echo of the water, an echo that extends from prehistory to Rome, the Ottoman Empire, the Republic, and today's Istanbul. This sound makes the connection that man establishes with water, memory, and existence audible.”
-Mehmet Lütfi Şen, Curator

title: Livber: Smoke and Mirrors
description:
Lilith, whom you believed dead for years, calls to you with nothing but a letter, summoning you back to the old house, silent witness to your past.  Inside the letter, there is only an address and a few haunting lines: *"I will birth our creation in our home. Come, and crown us in the dark. You and I must always be one."*  

Livber: Smoke and Mirrors, is a text-based interactive fiction game in the *choose-your-own-adventure* tradition. Your choices don’t just influence your next move; they reshape the entire narrative. 

I started the project for audible parts, but I spread to other departments like a virus.  

[Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3700580/Livber_Smoke_and_Mirrors/)

[Itch.io](https://inevgames.itch.io/livber-smoke-and-mirrors-prologue)

[InEvGames](http://inevgames.com/)
role: Soundtrack Composer, Audio Engineer, Audio FXs, and some other things

title: Touchdesigner Scripts
description:
I started to make my own Interactive Poster style by creating my own viusal scripts. 

These are for TouchDesigner (.tox) Some of them: 
* Drop Shadow Script 
* Bayer Dithering Algorithm Script
* Lasso-Masking Script 

You can purchase it from my [Buy Me a Coffee shop.](http://buymeacoffee.com/uluckaymak)

title: Excuse Me! I Have to Check Your Belongings
description:
"Imagine that you are a security guard. Your greatest pleasure is to feel the biscuit dipped in tea in your mouth. You can do anything to experience this pleasure every time. Do you really love biscuits, or is there another mystery behind this love? Ehm.. anyways, your boss was left alone during the shift. So you must do lots of things at the same time. Have a nice shift!"

Cozy Cosmic horror with Simulation. I know it sounds confusing, right? Yeah, we were confused too.

You are one of the last living magnific members of this cult, “The Cult of Sclorbgoth”. You know that God is real and a way to return to his former glory. Take him enough biscuits. If you can offer him a biscuit as large as the first creature... then you will have access to glory and pleasures beyond creation. But if you can't reach it... You will suffer the wrath of Schlorbgoth.
role: Soundtrack Composer, Audio Engineer, Game Designer

title: Synthesizer Prototype
description:
From the project's engineer, Reha:

"Developed within Turkey’s growing music technology scene, focuses on creating a cost-effective analog synthesizer that preserves the warm and dynamic qualities of analog sound. A Voltage-Controlled Oscillator (VCO) with sawtooth and pulse outputs (including Pulse-Width Modulation) has been successfully implemented, along with a Voltage-Controlled Amplifier (VCA) for dynamic output control. Control Voltage (CV) functionality is also supported, enabling precise pitch control and modular integration. Future work will expand on these foundations to enhance the synthesizer’s versatility and usability."

tldr: made musical blip-blop machine blocks with a very passionate team.

title: Göz, Kapalı
description:
"Göz, kapalı" is an art installation about the perception of time.

Time is an abstract concept that allows us to understand the sequence of events, their duration, and the relationships between them. Plato defines time in terms of change, and Aristotle says that time exists as long as there is a before and after.

But what happens to time when we are alone with ourselves, independent of external perceptions?

"Göz, kapalı" is a multi-layered narrative system based on the perception of time. While creating a visual that the experiencer can only experience with their eyes closed, it works through interactive ametric/granular music formation and the possibility of outcomes depending on one's experience.

Exhibited at: Eskizden Piksele | 2025_August_02-10 | Nevşehir_TR

title: Ride Up
description:
'The steepest climb between mind and body: Ride UP. Grab your bike and ascend through a world woven with delusions. Physics-based riding, brutal tracks, and a past that refuses to be remembered await you.' 

[Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3752520/Ride_Up/)

title: PersonA
description:
'The history of humanity is, in a way, the history of mankind’s efforts to define itself. In every age, in every society, in every individual, human beings have sought an image, a face, an identity. Art is one of the oldest and most powerful tools in this endeavor. Person A is a reflection of this search today: a portrait that dissolves the image of the individual into the collective — but never fixes it — changing with every glance, constantly reborn.' 
-Muzaffer Malkoç (Artist)  

Exhibited at: IFAD | 11-15 June | @AKM İstanbul

title: Istanbul, segmented
description: "Everytime I try to imagine the old Istanbul, it appears black and white in my mind. I really can't colorize it exactly. So if I can't done this properly, I have to it it as i see."

title: Unseen Images
description:
I have been studying "art consumption on social media" for a while. And I started to develop some projects and art pieces for social media platforms. Unseen Images, is my first project on this topic. 

Unseen Images is a deconstructive visual art project that produces visual sensory data without showing the main image behind the data. 
[https://x.com/UnseenbyUluc](https://x.com/UnseenbyUluc)

title: MUKARNASv3_müsenna
description:
As an architectural element, the muqarnas represent the ability to carry the weight of its extensive load at a single point and to be fixed. From the symbolical perspective, each layer of the muqarnas corresponds to a level, a stage in human life.  But each person goes through different lives, experiences, and degradations, carries life within these social formations, and stabilizes themselves. 

 Thanks to [Ayyıldız.pro](https://www.ayyildiz.pro/) for having me. 
 Exhibited at: Türkiye Culture Route | From Sketch to Pixel Digital Art "Anatolia Edition" | 2024

title: BilinçsizDavranışlar
description:
BilinçsizDavranışlar (UnconsciousBehaviors) interactively explains the impact of unconscious behaviors on social processes through social media. Installation is only visible through an Instagram filter. 

Thanks to İremko, Emir, Lül and Gaflen. 
Exhibited at: CAMP exhibition | 2024 September | @ŞahikaIst

title: Düşüncenin Tomografisi
description:
"We are all thinking. Thinking is a different kind of miracle."  

For each individual, a thought is unique. Two individuals share a common thought or a common knowledge. Even if they are thinking about it, they have come from different paths and have gained knowledge through different data. 

Different data means different processes.

title: Anla Ki - Olur Olmadık
description:
Anla Ki is an alternative rock band from Istanbul formed with lovely people. I made three album covers for them before. I also wrote and played the keyboard parts of this track. 

You can listen and follow them, and see my art from:

title: Avrupa'da Hayat
description:
Avrupa'da Hayat (Life in Europe) is a TV program about racism and discrimination in Germany. 
The program examines the groups exposed to racism, areas of systemic racism, the role of the media, the attitude of politics, the rise of right-wing movements, and the origins of racist ideology in the West.

Avrupa'da Hayat released on TRTTurkOpening Soundtrack Composer

title: Motivasyon Konu​ş​ması
description:
Warning: This speech is about motivation! 

A happy-sounding robotic voice tells you "Your dreams are completely normal, everybody dreaming about dying. And I believe you can do this." 

I think it's funny.

title: Anla Ki & Çiçek Dürbünü
description:
"People must feel friendly and special." That was my first brief. And we achieve that with a beautiful team with a beautiful soul. [Anla Ki](https://www.instagram.com/anlakiofficial/) and [Çiçek Dürbünü](https://www.instagram.com/thecicekdurbunu/) are alternative rock bands from Istanbul. 

Thanks to [Ozza Galata](https://www.instagram.com/ozzagalata/) for having us.
Thanks to [Reparikov](https://www.instagram.com/reparikov/) for letting me use his photos.

title: MUKARNASv2 Series
description:
Muqarnas is an architectural design. It represents the balance of the universe and each layer represents the degrees of human nature. "Every human being carries life in these social formations, going through different lives, different experiences, and different degradations." 

Ali Emre did an installation on this subject before as part of the biennial in Istanbul. 
[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=btTYDANmmUU) 

The necessary consent for the use of this interpreted work has been given by the author.

title: Bu Bir Strateji Oyunudur
description:
"Sadık (40) is an officer who does errands in the municipality. He is not valued at all at work and at home, and cannot express himself. But apart from all this, there is a place where Sadık finds himself: football fields in the neighborhoods. From the Director: People often think that life is not fair. Economic distributions, merit, love, and many more are never balanced. I have always been intrigued by the public's reaction to injustice, in chorus and loudest at football matches, especially through the referee. Why do we react so much to injustice in football? Is life so fair?"

24th Izmir Short Film Festival, National Panorama Section, Screening Selection. 2023

title: İletişim - TRT2
description:
İletişim (Communication for Turkish) is a documentary about the different concepts of the communication term and its subterms. With Prof. Dr. Mete Çamdereli, we discover new ways to explain communication as a social construct. 

İletişim was aired from September 2022 on TRT2 and trtizle.com
Stream on [TRTizle](https://www.trtizle.com/programlar/iletisim)

title: Edge of the Abyss
description:
"Let us hope that the slumbering behemoth never wakes up." This game is about a cult trying to keep the devil in a tome. We're gathering new people into the cult and trying to manage it. We had about 10 days, but we worked 5 days or fewer, I think. 

Long story short we can't finish it. However, that project has a significant place in my workflow and creative process.
[Itch.io](https://red-salmon.itch.io/abyss)

title: ERGENEKON Series
description:
Erdur Design Studio started making a graphic novel in 2019. The first series of them Ergenekon is still in process. I'll gonna produce more tracks about Ergenekon until the series ends. 

[erdur.com](https://erdur.com)
[BandCamp](https://uluc.bandcamp.com/album/ergenekon)
role: Motion Graphics for Social Media Ads, Soundtrack Composer

title: Untitled Project
description:
I was on Team 2 in 3Pixels. We were working on an action shooter game for mobile devices. I managed the audio team. I also made some stage theme songs for two whole levels. And recorded some creature sounds. 

Unfortunately, I had to leave the project before its first demos. But that project has a very significant place in my audio workflow.

title: Para - TRT2
description:
This is a documentary about the history of the economy and money itself.

From the publisher:
"The historical and cultural adventure of money from past to future..."

Para was aired on TRT2 (TV Channel) in 2021.
Stream on TRTizle

title: First Experiments (EP)

These are my first tracks, the first musical experiments ever. I also remastered these tracks in 2022. 

You can listen to the EP on [BandCamp](https://uluc.bandcamp.com/album/first-experiments)
